conversations.body_text:
Hello, I have not received any instructions or answers to my question, how
can we solve this problem?


On Fri, 6 Jun 2025 at 09.18, support@simsonn.com

Hello again, I have a problem with your product, I see that you are not
very willing to communicate, so I want to ask again, will we solve the
problem? Or I need to write to the consumer rights agency?

Hi ReMyGa RMG,     We'll send you a replacement accelerator from the latest batch, which we've urgently reinforced to ensure there will be no problems, and refund you $50 as compensation! We hope you'll be able to accept this option, and we're sorry for the inconvenience! Sincere apologies!

We agreed that you would send me instructions on how to return them. I am
not satisfied with the quality of the pedals and want to return them. Plus,
I received the pedals damaged, so I no longer want to use them.


On Tue, 10 Jun 2025 at 09.45, support@simsonn.com

The only option that would be suitable for me is if you send me a new pedal
and increase the compensation to $100, otherwise I would like to return the
product.
Hi ReMyGa RMG,  I discussed this with my manager and he felt that $80 was the maximum he could accept, thank you for your understanding .

ok I understood your answer, then send me instructions on how I could
return the product, it's very sad that we didn't find a solution


On Tue, 10 Jun 2025 at 11.20, support@simsonn.com

I purchased an item from you almost a month ago, which I still can't use
because it is broken, we can't find a proper agreement and compensation,
and you didn't send any instructions on how to return it, you are simply
ruining your company's reputation, will we finally resolve this issue?
Hi ReMyGa RMG,  I'm reporting your offer to our manager and I'll press him to deal with it as soon as possible, sorry for the delay.

Hello, I am still waiting for your answer.


On Wed, 11 Jun 2025 at 12.33, support@simsonn.com

hello again, my patience is running out, if I don't get an answer from you
today I will 100% be forced to contact international consumer rights, I
will leave a comment under every video on youtube about your poor
communication and unwillingness to cooperate, I will contact all the
platforms where you sell your products.
I want to solve this problem nicely but you are forcing me to do it

Hi ReMyGa RMG,    I'm very sorry, our manager has finally approved my request and I've refunded you, please check. I'm sorry for the trouble we caused you, we will reinforce your accelerator and will update you with the logistics number when it is sent out.

Hello, thank you for the compensation, can you please write the tracking
number of the pedal
